author: Jonny Rahimi
comment: Love this keyboard. Can't wait for the new Google watch so I can download this keyboard on it.
title: The Next Big Thing

author: Luadson Carvalho
comment: What a shame this awesome keyboard does not have support for portuguese language. I think this kind of typing is the next step of smartphone keyboards. But I use portuguese too, so I have to discard it.

author: Jason Lambirth
comment: Love it on my phone.  However does not work on my Sony Smartwatch 3.  UPDATE:  Since it is not there fault that Google has not pushed android wear 2.0 to my smartwatch, I do not feel just in dinging snapkeys for that.  Going to up my rating to show how I feel about it working as a phone keyboard replacement.

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: You are a true gentleman Jason, thank you! We can't wait for Google to officially roll out Android Wear 2.0, and for you to see the power of typing on a smartwatch. :)

author: Alchemy Meister
comment: Haven't tested it yet, I'll wait until an official Android wear 2 release. Just seeing the video it look promising. However, please reconsider redesigning you app icon.
title: That App Icon though

author: Dan S
comment: Installed it and it keeps crashing. Uninstalled and reinstalled... No change. Too bad!

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: Have you updated your Huawei watch to Android Wear 2.0? You need your smartwatch to have Android Wear 2.0 installed on it for the Snapkeys keyboard to work. You can download Android Wear 2.0 from Google's developer site. Email us at info@snapkeys.com and we will help you out. Please reconsider your rating if this was your problem

title: Doesn't work on Huawei smart watch

author: Dar Mack
comment: Why are the O and L keys switched? Makes no sense. Makes any word with those letters in them impossible to type at speed. Besides that very good!

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: They are switched because the accuracy for prediction is much higher with this layout. Having I, U, and O by each other will give much less accuracy. Even if you do mistype the L and O, the keyboards autocorrect will give you the correct word. You can still type extremely fast!

title: Good but...

author: Ken Smith
comment: Can't change the default language setting just crashes everyone.  Uninstalling.

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: Hey Ken, we have fixed your issue in the latest version of the app. The English language is available today, and will be rolling out new languages shortly. Please reconsider your rating. Thank you!

title: Waste of time

author: Yves Lepine
comment: On phone, Snapkeys mini overlaps the typed area. Timetype qwerty with that weird invisible keys mode also overlap. The right hand selectors icons are small and hard to make up. Vibration option is not working. The black space between the keyboard and type area should be removed when type history or numbers is not selected. When vertical line is selected the line wobbles.

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: On phone, to move the keyboard, choose "Typetime mini" keyboard from settings, and slide to the right on space key and move your keyboard. The right hand selector icons are a certain size because they are meant to be swiped towards, not tapped on. Will look into vibration issue. Black space is meant for word list. Will look into vertical line issue

title: Not bad

author: Ryan Ghassabian
comment: In order to use the smartwatch keyboard you need to have Android Wear 2.0 running on your LG Watch 2nd Edition or Huawei Watch.
title: Great Keyboard!

author: Russian Bot
comment: I was going to leave a bad rating after it kept crashing on my Moto 360 2015, but now I see you need Wear 2.0. So I'll give it the benefit of a doubt, and revisit once AW updates.

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: Thanks for your understanding! We hope Google decides to update the Moto 360 to Wear 2.0 sometime in the near future, as we know its a popular device amongst users.

title: Well...

author: h1tmanevets 1990
comment: As soon as I try to start it. LG G watch r.

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: The Snapkeys smartwatch keyboard only works on Android Wear devices running version 2.0. Unfortunately Google only allows the LG Watch Urbane 2nd edition and Huawei Watch update to Android Wear 2.0. It is out of our hands. That being said, we would appreciate if you reconsider your rating

title: Crashes

author: Shawn Pete
comment: The app won't run on my Sony SW3.

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: The Snapkeys smartwatch keyboard only works on Android Wear devices running version 2.0. Unfortunately Google only allows the LG Watch Urbane 2nd edition and Huawei Watch update to Android Wear 2.0. It is out of our hands. That being said, we would appreciate if you reconsider your rating. Snapkeys smartphone keyboard works on all Android phones

title: Keeps crashing...

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: Have you updated your Huawei watch to Android Wear 2.0? You need your smartwatch to have Android Wear 2.0 installed on it for the Snapkeys keyboard to work. You can download Android Wear 2.0 from Google's developer site. Email us at info@snapkeys.com and we will help you out. Please reconsider your rating if this was your problem

author: Samuel Monteiro
comment: Now I can type faster than ever
title: Excelent

author: Benjamin Ghassabian
comment: The most intelligent keyboard. Try it!

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: Can you let us know what is not working for you? If it is the smartwatch keyboard, you need to have either a LG Watch Urbane 2nd Edition or a Huawei watch, and the watch needs to be running Android Wear 2.0. We can help you download Wear 2.0, please email us at info@snapkeys.com. Please reconsider your rating if this was your problem

author: Spencer Goodman
comment: Crashed endlessly on moto 360(2nd gen) even after uninstalling. The thing that made me remove it and give it the 1star rating (cause I can't give it 0stars) My screen(watch) got rotated sideways. I had to factory wipe watch to fix this.

reply.author: Snapkeys
reply.content: The Snapkeys smartwatch keyboard only works on Android Wear devices running version 2.0. Unfortunately Google only allows the LG Watch Urbane 2nd edition and Huawei Watch update to Android Wear 2.0. It is out of our hands. We apologize for your trouble, and ask if you can reconsider your rating

reply.content: The Snapkeys smartwatch keyboard only works on Android Wear devices running version 2.0.
